4194879136,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-zurich-insurance-4194879136?position=39&pageNum=0&refId=a1%2FbE9rAgf3LrCKQl2Vm5Q%3D%3D&trackingId=GDw9UodhAGi1ZSjxwTpi6w%3D%3D,DATA SCIENTIST,Zurich Insurance,"S√£o Paulo, S√£o Paulo, Brazil","About Us

Zurich Insurance Company is a leading provider of insurance products and services, committed to delivering innovative solutions and exceptional customer service. Our ZCAM (Zurich Customer Active Management) team turns customer data into practical business solutions to drive the implementation of our ambitious customer strategy.

If you are a talented and experienced Data Scientist, passionate about designing and developing data analytics models and have a strong background in working with machine learning and different analytical tools, we would love to hear from you.
So make a difference. Be challenged. Be inspired. Be supported, Love what you do. Work with us.

The Data Scientist will be responsible for helping to power data-driven decisions and advancing the data and analytics tools of the Zurich organization. By leveraging new technology, the ZCAM data team ensures that all stakeholders in the organization can efficiently access reliable and accurate data. Their expertise helps create a strong data foundation within Zurich that keeps everyone informed and moving forward.
Design and development of analytics processes and algorithms
Sourcing, collecting and researching new data sources
Work closely with development teams to implement features into production
Work with management to develop a data science roadmap for future investments
Constantly explore the open-source developments to evolve and improve the data processing and analytics
University degree in physics, math, computer science or a related field
Professional experience in related role and/or demonstrated competency (projects) utilizing relevant technologies
Experience in modelling and predictive analytics with experience working with unstructured data
Experience with machine learning tools in big data environments
Experience with commercial and open-source analytics tools
Prior experience in financial institutions (or other similar industries) is a plus
Excellent verbal and written communication skills including the ability to explain technical issues to a non-technical audience
Strong work ethic and a can-do attitude
Knowledge of R and Python, publicly hosted LLMs
Strong problem-solving skills, analytical mind and attention to detail
Customer-oriented team player with good communication abilities, fostering effective collaboration and teamwork
Strong proficiency in both English and Portuguese is required, Spanish language skills are a plus
We look forward to receiving your online application.

Zurich wants to attract the best talent and we acknowledge that talents might not always be available full-time. At Zurich we will consider requests for flexible working. Many of our employees work flexibly in a variety of ways. Please talk to us during the interview about the flexibility you may need.
Zurich not providing relocation nor work permit assistance for these particular roles.

About Us

Zurich Insurance Company is a leading provider of insurance products and services, committed to delivering innovative solutions and exceptional customer service. Our ZCAM (Zurich Customer Active Management) team turns customer data into practical business solutions to drive the implementation of our ambitious customer strategy.

If you are a talented and experienced Data Scientist, passionate about designing and developing data analytics models and have a strong background in working with machine learning and different analytical tools, we would love to hear from you.

So make a difference. Be challenged. Be inspired. Be supported, Love what you do. Work with us.

The opportunity: DATA SCIENTIST

Job Description

The Data Scientist will be responsible for helping to power data-driven decisions and advancing the data and analytics tools of the Zurich organization. By leveraging new technology, the ZCAM data team ensures that all stakeholders in the organization can efficiently access reliable and accurate data. Their expertise helps create a strong data foundation within Zurich that keeps everyone informed and moving forward.

Responsibilities

  • Design and development of analytics processes and algorithms
  • Sourcing, collecting and researching new data sources
  • Work closely with development teams to implement features into production
  • Work with management to develop a data science roadmap for future investments
  • Constantly explore the open-source developments to evolve and improve the data processing and analytics

Requirements

  • University degree in physics, math, computer science or a related field
  • Professional experience in related role and/or demonstrated competency (projects) utilizing relevant technologies
  • Experience in modelling and predictive analytics with experience working with unstructured data
  • Experience with machine learning tools in big data environments
  • Experience with commercial and open-source analytics tools
  • Prior experience in financial institutions (or other similar industries) is a plus
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills including the ability to explain technical issues to a non-technical audience
  • Strong work ethic and a can-do attitude
  • Knowledge of R and Python, publicly hosted LLMs
  • SQL (Technical Models)
  • Machine Learning Knowledge
  • Strong problem-solving skills, analytical mind and attention to detail
  • Customer-oriented team player with good communication abilities, fostering effective collaboration and teamwork
  • Strong proficiency in both English and Portuguese is required, Spanish language skills are a plus

Additional Information

We look forward to receiving your online application.

Zurich wants to attract the best talent and we acknowledge that talents might not always be available full-time. At Zurich we will consider requests for flexible working. Many of our employees work flexibly in a variety of ways. Please talk to us during the interview about the flexibility you may need.

Zurich not providing relocation nor work permit assistance for these particular roles.

Location: Brazil - S√£o Paulo-SP (Tower Bridge)

3 years of experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.

5 years of experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.
4 years of experience analyzing data and creating reports with statistical, quantitative modeling, and forecasting skills.
3 years of experience in an applied research setting.

Knowledge of statistics, and proficiency in one or more statistical software packages (e.g., R, SPSS, Stata, SAS).

At Google, data drives all of our decision-making. Quantitative Analysts work all across the organization to help shape Google's business and technical strategies by processing, analyzing and interpreting huge data sets. Using analytical excellence and statistical methods, you mine through data to identify opportunities for Google and our clients to operate more efficiently, from enhancing advertising efficacy to network infrastructure optimization to studying user behavior. As an analyst, you do more than just crunch the numbers. You work with Engineers, Product Managers, Sales Associates and Marketing teams to adjust Google's practices according to your findings. Identifying the problem is only half the job
column2: you also figure out the solution.

column1: Google Research addresses challenges that define the technology of today and tomorrow. From conducting fundamental research to influencing product development, our research teams have the opportunity to impact technology used by billions of people every day.

Our teams aspire to make discoveries that impact everyone, and core to our approach is sharing our research and tools to fuel progress in the field -- we publish regularly in academic journals, release projects as open source, and apply research to Google products.

Collaborate with stakeholders in cross-projects and team settings to identify and clarify business or product questions to answer. Provide feedback to translate and refine business questions into tractable analysis, evaluation metrics, or mathematical models.

Use custom data infrastructure or existing data models as appropriate, using specialized knowledge. Design and evaluate models to mathematically express and solve defined problems with limited precedent.
Gather information, business goals, priorities, and organizational context around the questions to answer, as well as the existing and upcoming data infrastructure.

Own the process of gathering, extracting, and compiling data across sources via relevant tools (e.g., SQL, R, Python). Independently format, re-structure, or validate data to ensure quality, and review the dataset to ensure it is ready for analysis.

Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Please submit your resume in English - we can only consider applications submitted in this language.

Minimum qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, Operations Research, Engineering, or a related quantitative field.
  • 3 years of experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.
  • Ability to communicate in English and Portuguese fluently to support client relationship management in this region.

Preferred qualifications:

  • 5 years of experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or a PhD degree.
  • 4 years of experience analyzing data and creating reports with statistical, quantitative modeling, and forecasting skills.
  • 3 years of experience in an applied research setting.
  • Experience with Python, R, or other scripting languages.
  • Experience in survey research.
  • Knowledge of statistics, and proficiency in one or more statistical software packages (e.g., R, SPSS, Stata, SAS).

About The Job

At Google, data drives all of our decision-making. Quantitative Analysts work all across the organization to help shape Google's business and technical strategies by processing, analyzing and interpreting huge data sets. Using analytical excellence and statistical methods, you mine through data to identify opportunities for Google and our clients to operate more efficiently, from enhancing advertising efficacy to network infrastructure optimization to studying user behavior. As an analyst, you do more than just crunch the numbers. You work with Engineers, Product Managers, Sales Associates and Marketing teams to adjust Google's practices according to your findings. Identifying the problem is only half the job
column2:
you also figure out the solution.

Google Research addresses challenges that define the technology of today and tomorrow. From conducting fundamental research to influencing product development, our research teams have the opportunity to impact technology used by billions of people every day.

Our teams aspire to make discoveries that impact everyone, and core to our approach is sharing our research and tools to fuel progress in the field -- we publish regularly in academic journals, release projects as open source, and apply research to Google products.

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with stakeholders in cross-projects and team settings to identify and clarify business or product questions to answer. Provide feedback to translate and refine business questions into tractable analysis, evaluation metrics, or mathematical models.
  • Use custom data infrastructure or existing data models as appropriate, using specialized knowledge. Design and evaluate models to mathematically express and solve defined problems with limited precedent.
  • Gather information, business goals, priorities, and organizational context around the questions to answer, as well as the existing and upcoming data infrastructure.
  • Own the process of gathering, extracting, and compiling data across sources via relevant tools (e.g., SQL, R, Python). Independently format, re-structure, or validate data to ensure quality, and review the dataset to ensure it is ready for analysis.

4193629668,https://br.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-brex-4193629668?position=6&pageNum=2&refId=1X0rAJwV6yxe13oHc%2FSq2w%3D%3D&trackingId=QOxkF2xB4LR4Kor7aBfHsA%3D%3D,Data Scientist,Brex,"S√£o Paulo, S√£o Paulo, Brazil","Why join us

Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises ‚Äî including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass ‚Äî use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.

Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We‚Äôre committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.

Our Scientists and Engineers work together to make data ‚Äî and insights derived from data ‚Äî a core asset across Brex. But it's more than just crunching numbers. The Data team at Brex develops infrastructure, statistical models, and products using data. Our work is ingrained in Brex's decision-making process, the efficiency of our operations, our risk management policies, and the unparalleled experience we provide our customers.

As a Data Scientist focused on Product Analytics, you will work closely with Product, Engineering, and Customer Success teams to understand the interactions between product engagement, customer retention, and overall customer growth. Your work will be instrumental in shaping product decisions by uncovering insights into how customers interact with Brex‚Äôs platform, identifying opportunities to refine the product experience, optimize user workflows, and introduce impactful changes that increase long-term customer value and drive sustainable revenue growth.

The ideal candidate has experience leveraging product intuition and advanced analytics to understand customer behavior, measure product impact on revenue retention and growth, and derive insights through causal inference and predictive modeling. They should also have a strong ability to translate data insights into actionable recommendations for product and business teams.

This role will be based in our Sao Paulo office. You must be willing to work in office at least 2 days per week on Wednesday and Thursday, starting the week of September 1st, 2025. when we open our Sao Paulo office. Employees will be able to work remotely for up to 4 weeks per year.
Develop and apply data-driven methodologies to analyze customer behavior, retention trends, and product adoption, focusing on how product changes impact long-term customer value.
Design and implement predictive models, causal inference methods, as well as experimentation strategies to measure and optimize the effect of product changes on customer growth and engagement.
Partner with Product, Engineering, and Customer Success teams to identify key opportunities for improving customer engagement and long-term retention.
Collaborate with Data Engineering to build scalable data pipelines that support product analytics and reporting.
Clearly communicate findings and strategic recommendations to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Master‚Äôs degree or Ph.D. in Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related quantitative field.
3+ years of experience in a data science, analytics, or related role focused on product analytics.
Strong experience with SQL and Python (or R) for data analysis and modeling.
Proficiency in A/B testing methodologies, causal inference, and predictive modeling.
Ability to translate complex data insights into strategic business recommendations.
Familiarity with BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Looker) and data visualization best practices.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, cross-functional environment.
English proficiency/fluency, both written and spoken (note: interviews will be conducted in English).
Experience working in B2B SaaS or fintech.
Experience in developing frameworks to measure feature adoption and identifying product opportunities that drive customer lifetime value.
Familiarity with product analytics tools (e.g., Amplitude, StatSig).
Must be working in Brazil at the start of role

Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a brex.com domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.

Why join us

Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises ‚Äî including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass ‚Äî use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.

Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We‚Äôre committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.

Data at Brex

Our Scientists and Engineers work together to make data ‚Äî and insights derived from data ‚Äî a core asset across Brex. But it's more than just crunching numbers. The Data team at Brex develops infrastructure, statistical models, and products using data. Our work is ingrained in Brex's decision-making process, the efficiency of our operations, our risk management policies, and the unparalleled experience we provide our customers.

What You‚Äôll Do

As a Data Scientist focused on Product Analytics, you will work closely with Product, Engineering, and Customer Success teams to understand the interactions between product engagement, customer retention, and overall customer growth. Your work will be instrumental in shaping product decisions by uncovering insights into how customers interact with Brex‚Äôs platform, identifying opportunities to refine the product experience, optimize user workflows, and introduce impactful changes that increase long-term customer value and drive sustainable revenue growth.

The ideal candidate has experience leveraging product intuition and advanced analytics to understand customer behavior, measure product impact on revenue retention and growth, and derive insights through causal inference and predictive modeling. They should also have a strong ability to translate data insights into actionable recommendations for product and business teams.

Where you‚Äôll work

This role will be based in our Sao Paulo office. You must be willing to work in office at least 2 days per week on Wednesday and Thursday, starting the week of September 1st, 2025. when we open our Sao Paulo office. Employees will be able to work remotely for up to 4 weeks per year.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and apply data-driven methodologies to analyze customer behavior, retention trends, and product adoption, focusing on how product changes impact long-term customer value.
  • Design and implement predictive models, causal inference methods, as well as experimentation strategies to measure and optimize the effect of product changes on customer growth and engagement.
  • Partner with Product, Engineering, and Customer Success teams to identify key opportunities for improving customer engagement and long-term retention.
  • Collaborate with Data Engineering to build scalable data pipelines that support product analytics and reporting.
  • Clearly communicate findings and strategic recommendations to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Requirements

  • Master‚Äôs degree or Ph.D. in Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related quantitative field.
  • 3+ years of experience in a data science, analytics, or related role focused on product analytics.
  • Strong experience with SQL and Python (or R) for data analysis and modeling.
  • Proficiency in A/B testing methodologies, causal inference, and predictive modeling.
  • Ability to translate complex data insights into strategic business recommendations.
  • Familiarity with BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Looker) and data visualization best practices.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, cross-functional environment.
  • English proficiency/fluency, both written and spoken (note: interviews will be conducted in English).

Bonus Points

  • Experience working in B2B SaaS or fintech.
  • Experience in developing frameworks to measure feature adoption and identifying product opportunities that drive customer lifetime value.
  • Familiarity with product analytics tools (e.g., Amplitude, StatSig).

Location

  • Must be working in Brazil at the start of role

Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. Brex recruiters will only reach out via LinkedIn or email with a brex.com domain. Any outreach claiming to be from Brex via other sources should be ignored.

Design and run experiments to analyze the impact of product changes

Communicate your findings to cross-functional peers and management.
Senior and/or Staff seniority in a Business/Data/Science role (6yrs+ of experience)
Previous experience improving products, understanding the user journey, and extracting insights from data
Solid experience using Python or R
Experience launching multiple experiments (such as A/B experiments) and an understanding of experimental design and using statistical methods in exploratory analysis
Casual Inference experience is a huge plus
Bachelors or M.S. in Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or other quantitative fields.
Please note: this hybrid position is based in S√£o Paulo, Brazil - welcoming both local professionals and those open to relocating to S√£o Paulo.

Thanks to our diversity of skills, talents and cultures, our customers (governments, institutions, space agencies, telecommunications operators), therefore have Space to Connect, Secure & Defend, Observe & Protect, Explore, Travel & Navigate.
You graduated from an Engineering School with a master‚Äôs degree ‚Äì a PhD is a plus

Your level of experience ranges from junior to advance: you are a student OR/AND you have already occupied one or more positions among the following: Algorithm or Software Engineer, Artificial Intelligence Engineer

You enjoy thinking ""outside the box"" and use your creativity to address complex challenges
You are recognised as a team player and promote collaborative work
You are user centric and want to design components accordingly
You have in-depth knowledge in mathematics, algorithms, experiment plan, continuous iterations and Agility

Data driven AI, Symbolic AI, Hybrid AI on the Solution

You can confidently discuss with people from different jobs and background

adopting modern Agile and DevOps processes

LIFE AS A THALES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINEERING ROLE

At Thales Alenia Space we provide CAREERS and not only jobs. A Joint Venture between Thales (67%) and Leonardo (33%), Thales Alenia Space is a global space manufacturer delivering, for more than 40 years, high-tech solutions for telecommunications, navigation, Earth Observation, environmental management, exploration, science and orbital infrastructures. Thanks to our diversity of skills, talents and cultures, our customers (governments, institutions, space agencies, telecommunications operators), therefore have Space to Connect, Secure &amp
column2: Defend, Observe &amp
column3: Protect, Explore, Travel &amp
column4:
Navigate.

Artificial Intelligence Engineering

CANDIDATES THAT WOULD IMPRESS US

PROFILE:

You graduated from an Engineering School with a master‚Äôs degree ‚Äì a PhD is a plus

Your level of experience ranges from junior to advance: you are a student OR/AND you have already occupied one or more positions among the following: Algorithm or Software Engineer, Artificial Intelligence Engineer

You are curious and willing to stay abreast of the latest trends (technical, philosophical, ethical by design)

You enjoy thinking ""outside the box"" and use your creativity to address complex challenges

You are recognised as a team player and promote collaborative work

You are user centric and want to design components accordingly

COMPETENCIES:

You have in-depth knowledge in mathematics, algorithms, experiment plan, continuous iterations and Agility

You are proficient in one of the following Artificial Intelligence Approches:

Data driven AI, Symbolic AI, Hybrid AI on the Solution

Symbolic Artificial Intelligence and reasoning

Human/machine dialog

Systems Analysis

You understand the norms, laws and standards

You have knowledge of cybersecurity

You can confidently discuss with people from different jobs and background

You master foundational concepts in mathematics/ statistics science and their application to deploy them on Solution studies: statistical modelling, linear algebra, optimisation, machine learning Mathematics and Statistics

LIFE AS A THALES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENGINEERING ROLE

As an Artificial Intelligence Engineering Role within Thales, you will:

Design and develop trustworthy artificial intelligence components for various domains

Identify the right cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technologies (machine learning, symbolic AI, dialogue) and develop the Artificial Intelligence component accordingly

Work on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Understanding (NLU), and also to design multimodal approaches for Human-Machin Dialog including intention understanding, reasoning and hybrid AI

Work on Machine Learning, causality vs. correlation, and/or other Data driven AI technics such as Random Forest, Evolutionary Algorithms, ‚Ä¶

Work on Symbolic AI, Ontology, Semantic Web, Knowledge based Reasoning, Meta-heuristics, Problem Solving, Operations Research, Decision Making and reasoning

Propose and design approach alternatives

Integrate scientific method into engineering system methodology

Ensure data knowledge and traceability

Ensure continuous technowatch and be aware of the latest trends (technical, philosophical, ethical by design)

Define the system capabilities thanks to a functional, logical and value analysis, describing functions to be performed to meet the real needs of the user in the various scenarii and maximising product value for Customer

YOUR CAREER AT THALES

Future opportunities will allow you to discover other domains or sites. You will be able to evolve and grow your competences in different areas:

Room and attention to personal development

Build your talents in another domain of Thales Group, discovering new products, new customers, new country or go to a more complex Solution

Choose between a technical expertise or a leadership path

Build an international career within a leading Engineering Group

At Thales Alenia Space we provide CAREERS and not only jobs. With Thales Alenia Space employing around 8,900 employees in 10 countries with 17 sites in Europe and a plant in the US, our mobility policy enables employees each year to develop their careers at home and abroad. Thales Alenia Space sees space as a new horizon, helping to build a better, more sustainable life on Earth #SpaceForLife. Great journeys start here, apply now!

4173089781,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/generative-ai-machine-learning-engineer-at-rina-4173089781?position=26&pageNum=0&refId=Vzryh%2BnA5vEHltalcx8O9A%3D%3D&trackingId=1nrlgEv0aPrLwy2el72JaA%3D%3D,Generative AI & Machine Learning Engineer,RINA,"Rome, Latium, Italy","RINA is currently recruiting for a Generative AI & Machine Learning Engineer to join its office in Rome/Naples within the Digital Technology and Cybersecurity Division.

The mission of this role is to design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge generative AI solutions on the Azure platform. The successful candidate will leverage Azure's AI tools and services to create innovative applications that drive business growth and efficiency.
Solution Design & Development: Design and develop generative AI models and algorithms using Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, and Azure Machine Learning.
AI Model Training: Fine-tune and optimize pre-built generative models or develop custom solutions for NLP, image generation, and other AI applications.
Cloud Integration: Implement end-to-end AI solutions, integrating them with existing cloud infrastructures and leveraging Azure services such as Azure Data Lake, Azure Functions, and Azure DevOps.

Deployment & Monitoring: Deploy AI models in production environments, ensuring scalability, security, and high performance. Utilize Azure‚Äôs monitoring tools to track model performance and optimize for efficiency.
Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, cloud architects, and product teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Innovation: Stay updated with the latest trends in AI and cloud technology, continuously improving and adapting the AI solutions to enhance business capabilities.
Programming Languages: Advanced proficiency in Python, with experience in using AI/ML libraries (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow).
Azure AI Services: Strong knowledge of Azure OpenAI, Cognitive Services, and Azure Machine Learning.
Cloud Architecture: Solid understanding of cloud architecture, especially within the Azure ecosystem (Azure Functions, Azure DevOps, Azure Kubernetes Services).
DevOps Practices: Experience with DevOps practices for AI deployment (CI/CD pipelines, containerization).
Generative Models: In-depth experience with models like GPT-4, Llama, including fine-tuning and customization.
NLP Techniques: Experience in natural language processing and text generation patterns.
Advanced Python Development: Knowledge of best practices, frameworks, and code optimization.
Teamwork: Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Problem Solving: Analytical skills to tackle complex issues.
Certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate or similar certifications.
ADDRESS THE WAY - Have a big picture of different situations and reinterpret it in a perspective way
BUILD NETWORK - Forge trust relationships, across departments, and outside the organization
CLIENT INTIMACY - Embrace internal and external client needs, expectations, and requirements to ensure maximum satisfaction
EARN TRUST - Take everyone's opinion into account and remain open to diversity
MAKE EFFECTIVE DECISIONS - Structure activities according to priorities, actions, resources and constraint
MANAGE EMOTIONS - Recognise one's and other's emotions and express and regulate one's reactions
PIONEER CHANGE - Actively embrace change and benefit from the new circumstances
PROMOTE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT - Promote commitment by keeping promises as a Role Model
THINK FORWARD - Capitalise on experiences and translate them into action plans for the future

With over 5,800 employees and 200 offices in 70 countries worldwide, RINA is a multinational player which provides certification, marine classification, product testing, site supervision and vendor inspection, training and engineering consultancy services across a wide range of sectors. Our business model covers the full process of project development, from concept to completion. The aim is to guarantee a project‚Äôs technical, environmental and safety - and sometimes also economic and financial - sustainability.

At RINA, we endeavor to create a work environment where every single person is valued and encouraged to develop new ideas. We provide equal employment opportunities and are committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels respected and safe from discrimination or harassment of any kind. We are also compliant to the Italian Law n. 68/99.

    • ADDRESS THE WAY - Have a big picture of different situations and reinterpret it in a perspective way
    • BUILD NETWORK - Forge trust relationships, across departments, and outside the organization
    • CLIENT INTIMACY - Embrace internal and external client needs, expectations, and requirements to ensure maximum satisfaction
    • EARN TRUST - Take everyone's opinion into account and remain open to diversity
    • MAKE EFFECTIVE DECISIONS - Structure activities according to priorities, actions, resources and constraint
    • MANAGE EMOTIONS - Recognise one's and other's emotions and express and regulate one's reactions
    • PIONEER CHANGE - Actively embrace change and benefit from the new circumstances
    • PROMOTE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT - Promote commitment by keeping promises as a Role Model
    • THINK FORWARD - Capitalise on experiences and translate them into action plans for the future

    With over 5,800 employees and 200 offices in 70 countries worldwide, RINA is a multinational player which provides certification, marine classification, product testing, site supervision and vendor inspection, training and engineering consultancy services across a wide range of sectors. Our business model covers the full process of project development, from concept to completion. The aim is to guarantee a project‚Äôs technical, environmental and safety - and sometimes also economic and financial - sustainability.

    At RINA, we endeavor to create a work environment where every single person is valued and encouraged to develop new ideas. We provide equal employment opportunities and are committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels respected and safe from discrimination or harassment of any kind. We are also compliant to the Italian Law n. 68/99.

La risorsa Experienced verr√† inserita in un team di lavoro:
Di sviluppatori impegnati nell'esecuzione di progetti e in attivit√† di ricerca e sviluppo (R&D).

Laurea triennale richiesta, preferibilmente in un campo correlato alle STEM (Data Science, Informatica, Ingegneria, Fisica, Matematica, ecc.)

Oltre 2 anni di esperienza in data science e analisi di rete, inclusi lo sviluppo di algoritmi AI/ML e l'analisi dei dati nelle principali modalit√† di dati da NLP, analisi delle serie temporali, computer vision, a modelli grafici.
Oltre 2 anni di esperienza nei linguaggi di programmazione principali e nei pacchetti di data science (Python, Keras, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Jupyter, XGBoost, lgbm ecc.)
Esperienza di lavoro con LLMs (GPT, LLaMA, Claude, ecc.) e modelli multimodali.

Solida comprensione della modellazione probabilistica, dell'apprendimento non supervisionato e delle tecniche di interpretabilit√† dei modelli.
Esperienza pratica con database vettoriali, generazione aumentata dal recupero (RAG) e ingegneria dei prompt.

Esperienza con la containerizzazione (Docker) e lo sviluppo di API per il deployment e l'integrazione dei modelli √® un plus.

4173642993,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/client-engineering-ai-engineer-data-scientist-at-ibm-4173642993?position=40&pageNum=0&refId=Vzryh%2BnA5vEHltalcx8O9A%3D%3D&trackingId=6HuXPrutg%2F%2BVJSo1dbci5w%3D%3D,Client Engineering AI Engineer/Data Scientist,IBM,"Rome, Latium, Italy","Introduction

At IBM, we're revolutionizing our approach to technology sales. Our Client Engineering teams are champions of co-creating solutions in real-time to solve complex business challenges. As an AI Engineer within our Client Engineering team, you'll harness your unique skills and perspectives to engage in the development and deployment of AI systems using our watsonx platform, creating 4-to-8-week pilots for clients, and contributing to IBM's story of growth and innovation. In this role, you'll partner with technical leaders across IBM and drive client engagements with a curiosity that sparks innovation and learning. Your contributions will form a cornerstone in our sales strategy, facilitating rapid client delivery and product innovation. At IBM the possibilities are endless. We offer extensive onboarding and ongoing development, fostering an environment where you can thrive and shape your own career trajectory. Surrounded by a supportive team, you'll be integral in creating user-centric, compelling pilots that lead clients to continually invest in IBM's people, products, and services.

An AI Engineer at IBM is not just a job title - it's a mindset. You'll leverage the watsonx platform to co-create AI value with clients, focusing on technology patterns to enhance repeatability and delight clients. Success is our passion, and your accomplishments will reflect this, driving your career forward, propelling your team to success, and helping our clients to thrive.

Proof of Concept (POC) Development: Develop POCs to validate and highlight the feasibility and effectiveness of the proposed AI solutions. Collaborate with development teams to implement and iterate on POCs, ensuring alignment with customer requirements and expectations.
Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth execution and successful delivery of AI solutions. Effectively communicate progress, risks, and dependencies to stakeholders.

Solution Implementation and Deployment: Oversee the implementation and deployment of AI Pilots, working closely with development teams to ensure adherence to best practices, quality standards, and performance requirements. Provide technical guidance and support during the implementation phase.
Customer Engagement and Support: Provide technical support during the solution development phase and offer guidance on AI-related best practices and use cases.

Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Document solution architectures, design decisions, implementation details, and lessons learned. Contribute to internal knowledge sharing initiatives and mentor new team members.

Industry Trends and Innovation: Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in AI, foundation models, and large language models. Evaluate emerging technologies, tools, and frameworks to assess their potential impact on solution design and implementation.
AI-Related Education: Possess a Bachelor's, Master's, or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.

Designing and delivering AI solutions: With a focus on foundation models, large language models, exposure to open source, or similar technologies. Experience in natural language processing (NLP) and text analytics is highly desirable. Understanding of machine learning and deep learning algorithms and the application of technology for the govenrance of data and models.

Strong programming skills: Proficiency in Python and experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras or Hugging Face. Understanding in the usage of libraries such as SciKit Learn, Pandas, Matplotlib, etc. Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g. IBM , Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, GCP) and related services is a plus.
Solutioning Experience: Solution architecture and design, translating business requirements into technical specifications, developing scalable and robust AI solutions.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills: Engage with stakeholders for analysis and implementation. Commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with advancements in the field of AI.
Growth mindset: Demonstrate a growth mindset to understand clients' business processes and challenges.
Comprehensive Familiarity with IBM's Offerings AI Strategy and offerings: Hands-on experience with any of IBM's products and services (training across IBM's product suite will be provided).

Introduction

At IBM, we're revolutionizing our approach to technology sales. Our Client Engineering teams are champions of co-creating solutions in real-time to solve complex business challenges. As an AI Engineer within our Client Engineering team, you'll harness your unique skills and perspectives to engage in the development and deployment of AI systems using our watsonx platform, creating 4-to-8-week pilots for clients, and contributing to IBM's story of growth and innovation. In this role, you'll partner with technical leaders across IBM and drive client engagements with a curiosity that sparks innovation and learning. Your contributions will form a cornerstone in our sales strategy, facilitating rapid client delivery and product innovation. At IBM the possibilities are endless. We offer extensive onboarding and ongoing development, fostering an environment where you can thrive and shape your own career trajectory. Surrounded by a supportive team, you'll be integral in creating user-centric, compelling pilots that lead clients to continually invest in IBM's people, products, and services.

Your Role And Responsibilities

An AI Engineer at IBM is not just a job title - it's a mindset. You'll leverage the watsonx platform to co-create AI value with clients, focusing on technology patterns to enhance repeatability and delight clients. Success is our passion, and your accomplishments will reflect this, driving your career forward, propelling your team to success, and helping our clients to thrive.

Your Primary Responsibilities Will Include

  • Proof of Concept (POC) Development: Develop POCs to validate and highlight the feasibility and effectiveness of the proposed AI solutions. Collaborate with development teams to implement and iterate on POCs, ensuring alignment with customer requirements and expectations.
  • Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth execution and successful delivery of AI solutions. Effectively communicate progress, risks, and dependencies to stakeholders.
  • Solution Implementation and Deployment: Oversee the implementation and deployment of AI Pilots, working closely with development teams to ensure adherence to best practices, quality standards, and performance requirements. Provide technical guidance and support during the implementation phase.
  • Customer Engagement and Support: Provide technical support during the solution development phase and offer guidance on AI-related best practices and use cases.
  • Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Document solution architectures, design decisions, implementation details, and lessons learned. Contribute to internal knowledge sharing initiatives and mentor new team members.
  • Industry Trends and Innovation: Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in AI, foundation models, and large language models. Evaluate emerging technologies, tools, and frameworks to assess their potential impact on solution design and implementation.

Preferred Education

Master's Degree

Required Technical And Professional Expertise

  • AI-Related Education: Possess a Bachelor's, Master's, or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Designing and delivering AI solutions: With a focus on foundation models, large language models, exposure to open source, or similar technologies. Experience in natural language processing (NLP) and text analytics is highly desirable. Understanding of machine learning and deep learning algorithms and the application of technology for the govenrance of data and models.
  • Strong programming skills: Proficiency in Python and experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras or Hugging Face. Understanding in the usage of libraries such as SciKit Learn, Pandas, Matplotlib, etc. Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g. IBM , Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, GCP) and related services is a plus.
  • Solutioning Experience: Solution architecture and design, translating business requirements into technical specifications, developing scalable and robust AI solutions.
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills: Engage with stakeholders for analysis and implementation. Commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with advancements in the field of AI.
  • Growth mindset: Demonstrate a growth mindset to understand clients' business processes and challenges.

Preferred Technical And Professional Experience

Comprehensive Familiarity with IBM's Offerings AI Strategy and offerings: Hands-on experience with any of IBM's products and services (training across IBM's product suite will be provided).

4153174389,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/fullstack-engineer-at-tabby-4153174389?position=41&pageNum=0&refId=Vzryh%2BnA5vEHltalcx8O9A%3D%3D&trackingId=sjcnhTUJZeiinBFwryRrXg%3D%3D,Fullstack Engineer,Tabby,"Rome, Latium, Italy","Department: B2B Financial Services, Engineering

Tabby creates financial freedom in the way people shop, earn and save by reshaping their relationship with money. Over 5,000,000 active users choose Tabby to stay in control of their spending and make the most out of their money.

Over 30,000 global brands and small businesses, including H&M, Adidas, IKEA, SHEIN, noon, and Bloomingdale‚Äôs, use Tabby‚Äôs technology to accelerate growth and gain loyal customers by offering flexible payments online and in stores. Tabby is active in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt and Kuwait and backed by leading investors, including Sequoia Capital India, STV, PayPal Ventures, Mubadala Investment Capital, Arbor Ventures and others.

We are looking for Fullstack Engineer to join our newly formed Business Accounts team. This team focuses on all Wallet features (Business Accounts, Cards, Finance products..). It is a B2B product, in a stream which will launch a ton of new features in the coming year, so there is an observable influence from day 1. The team is passionate about the product and best-in-market customer experience.
Strong Backend coding ability (ideally with Golang)
5+ years as a Backend or Fullstack Engineer at a fast-growing product company
2+ years of experience with ideally both Golang and Typescript with React
Profound experience with partner APIs integration and product development
A passion for writing clean and testable code
And, of course, you should be proactive, enthusiastic and independent.
Some of the technologies you'll get to work with:
We offer flexible working hours and trust you to work enough hours to do your job well, at times that suit you and your team.
A working environment that gives you autonomy and responsibility from day one.
You should be comfortable with the idea that the quality of your work will influence the shape of your career.
Participation in company‚Äôs employee stock options program.
We offer remote work from anywhere in the world and are happy to work out an individual relocation plan for you.
Our employees have the opportunity to choose a country for registration: at the moment those are Armenia/Georgia/Serbia/Portugal/Spain.
We will help you open a legal entity and a bank account. In Armenia and Georgia the taxes are compensated by Tabby. In other countries we provide partial compensation of taxes.
We employ according to B2B contracts (service agreements).
For our employees we cover the following:
Flight to one of the mentioned countries.
Accommodation during the paperwork completion period.
Opening a bank account and getting a residence permit in one of the mentioned countries.

New employees can also choose an alternative method of relocation to another country of their choice. In this case, Tabby will reimburse up to $5,000 of verified costs upon opening a legal entity and a bank account.
We are passionate about creating an inclusive, high-performing workplace that gives people from all backgrounds the support they need to thrive, grow and meet their goals (whatever they may be).
If this sounds exciting to you, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

The ideal candidate as Senior Data Scientist in NTT DATA will have a mix of skills including Generative AI hands-on capability (preferably on Azure/GCP and on-premise) engineering best practices, statistical expertise, Machine and Deep Learning skills and a strong business sense.

The Senior Data Scientist will work with fellow data scientists, data engineers, ML Engineers, product managers, business analysts, and stakeholders from other internal groups and from external clients.
He/She will be responsible for multiple projects, leading the Data Scientists and connecting with the stakeholders on client?s side, to ensure that tasks are on time and well executed.
Experience of at least 3-5 years as data scientist
Knowledge of Java/Scala or C++/R is a plus
Tensorflow and Pytorch knowledge with a focus over Computer Vision solutions
Knowledge of ML solutions architecture and Generative AI pipelines
Incorporate new, cutting edge business intelligence, machine learning, and alternative data practices into wider organization to drive efficiencies and generate revenue
Own the full stack execution of data science projects from data wrangling, model development, presentation, measurement to deployment
Work with data engineers to produce fully productionized pipelines including data ingestion, cleaning, feature engineering and model training/prediction
Conduct research and analysis into reinsurance and advisory products to augment industry-standard models and develop new market offerings
Establish and maintain strong relationships with internal team members and external clients
Location: Milano, Bari, Bologna, Cosenza, Napoli, Roma, Salerno, Torino

Bip ha creato all‚Äôinterno del proprio Competence Centre ‚ÄúxTech‚Äù il pi√π nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dall‚ÄôItalia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere.

4016660360,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/front-end-developer-italy-at-ion-4016660360?position=46&pageNum=0&refId=Vzryh%2BnA5vEHltalcx8O9A%3D%3D&trackingId=aSdXUK92dMiNOJEF4YOIQQ%3D%3D,Front End Developer - Italy,ION,"Rome, Latium, Italy","Company Overview
We are seeking ambitious and self-driven candidates to join our global team. Our company offers opportunities to work with cutting-edge technology and provides career growth prospects.

The Front-End Developer will be responsible for translating designs into code and creating customer-centric experiences. This role involves collaboration with a diverse, globally distributed team including software engineers, UX designers, product/project managers, and domain specialists.
Implement user interface designs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript
Develop responsive and cross-browser compatible web applications
Collaborate with UX designers to optimize user experiences
Manage source control systems adhering to best practices
Communicate effectively with team members across different time zones
Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
Expertise in at least one of: Angular or React
Familiarity with test-driven development tools and practices
Knowledge of source control systems and best practices
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong interpersonal skills for effective teamwork
Fluency in English (both written and spoken)
Valid EU visa or work permit
Knowledge of additional front-end frameworks or libraries
According to the Italian Law (L.68/99) please note that candidates from the disability list will be given priority.

Please do not apply if you don‚Äôt currently have the legal right to work in Italy, or if that right is just about to expire, or if that right has restrictions imposed which would prevent you from undertaking a full-time employment contract.
Due to the high volume of applications, only those candidates that meet the required criteria for selection will be contacted.

Company Overview

We are seeking ambitious and self-driven candidates to join our global team. Our company offers opportunities to work with cutting-edge technology and provides career growth prospects.

Job Description

The Front-End Developer will be responsible for translating designs into code and creating customer-centric experiences. This role involves collaboration with a diverse, globally distributed team including software engineers, UX designers, product/project managers, and domain specialists.

Key Responsibilities

  • Implement user interface designs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript
  • Develop responsive and cross-browser compatible web applications
  • Collaborate with UX designers to optimize user experiences
  • Work within Agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban)
  • Utilize test-driven development practices
  • Manage source control systems adhering to best practices
  • Communicate effectively with team members across different time zones

Education

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or related field

Technical Skills

  • Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
  • Experience with functional programming
  • Expertise in at least one of: Angular or React
  • Familiarity with test-driven development tools and practices
  • Knowledge of source control systems and best practices

Methodologies

  • Experience with Agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban)

Soft Skills

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills for effective teamwork

Language

  • Fluency in English (both written and spoken)

Legal

  • Valid EU visa or work permit

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience working in distributed teams
  • Knowledge of additional front-end frameworks or libraries
  • Understanding of UX/UI principles

Employment Details

  • Contract Type: Full-time, permanent
  • Working Mode: Hybrid

Learn more at iongroup.com.

Important Notes

According to the Italian Law (L.68/99) please note that candidates from the disability list will be given priority.

Please do not apply if you don‚Äôt currently have the legal right to work in Italy, or if that right is just about to expire, or if that right has restrictions imposed which would prevent you from undertaking a full-time employment contract.

Due to the high volume of applications, only those candidates that meet the required criteria for selection will be contacted.

Addestramento e valutazione di modelli di Machine Learning
Implementazione di soluzioni basate su AI predittiva.
Misurazione della qualit√† delle risposte AI
Identificazione e mitigazione dei bias nei modelli
Ottimizzazione delle generazioni AI per garantire accuratezza e affidabilit√†.

Esperienza pratica con LLM e NLP

Competenza in Python, API AI, SQL, TensorFlow/PyTorch
Capacit√† di analizzare e migliorare le prestazioni dei modelli AI
Esperienza nell‚Äôottimizzazione di prompt e creazione di sistemi RAG
Forte attitudine alla sperimentazione e alla risoluzione di problemi complessi.
Gestione del Tempo e delle priorit√†
TopNetwork s.p.a √® un‚Äôazienda leader nel settore ICT ad alta Innovazione tecnologica, collocata tra i principali player per grandi aziende e istituzioni sul territorio nazionale.

Il Gruppo Aeroporti di Roma, nell‚Äôambito della Business Unit Aviation nell‚Äôunit√† Operation & Maintenance, in particolare nell‚Äôasset ‚ÄúO&M and IoT Data Engineering, Environmental Operations‚Äù √® alla ricerca di:

L‚Äôasset O&M and IoT Data Engineering, Environmental Operations si occupa principalmente di garantire la progettazione, l‚Äôimplementazione e l‚Äôintegrazione di soluzioni IoT per la gestione degli asset, ingegnerizzando e analizzando i dati al fine di abilitare l‚Äôevoluzione della strategia manutentiva degli asset in ottica di value for money.

La risorsa avr√† maturato un‚Äôesperienza di 3 ‚Äì 5 anni in area automation presso realt√† industriali preferibilmente del settore trasporti/alimentare/beverage/pharma/automotive o presso societ√† impiantistiche costruttrici.

Sar√† considerato un plus l‚Äôaver maturato esperienza nell‚Äôambito di Data Science, Machine Learning o Software Engineering, preferibilmente in strutture di AI e Data analytics all‚Äôinterno di aziende a forte componente industriale/operativa o in aziende di consulenza che hanno sviluppato progetti relativi ai sopracitati ambiti.
Principali attivit√† e aree di responsabilit√†

Collaborare alla progettazione e allo sviluppo di nuove funzionalit√† di piattaforme di monitoraggio/SCADA di asset e impianti aeroportuali, automatizzando il processo di gestione dei dati e definendo la tipologia di dati da monitorare
Collaborare attivamente per progettare e concepire nuove sensorizzazioni

Definire, sviluppare e implementare i flussi di dati provenienti dai diversi asset e impianti aeroportuali, assicurando che i dati siano strutturati in modo coerente con le esigenze tecnico/manutentive e pronti per essere analizzati
Integrare nuove fonti di dati nei sistemi esistenti, collaborando con fornitori e strutture tecniche per l‚Äôimplementazione delle soluzioni identificate
Definire e implementare le politiche di data governance, tra cui la definizione di standard di qualit√† dei dati e le linee guida di storicizzazione
Collaborare con i team di data science, data analysis e altri stakeholder aziendali per comprendere le esigenze di dati utili a sviluppare modelli di Machine Learning/AI.
Conoscenza pratica di PLC, DCS, SCADA, MES e problematiche relative allo scambio di segnali tra differenti sistemi di automazione
Esperienza con protocolli IoT: LoRaWAN, Zigbee, MQTT, OPC-UA per gestione e trasmissione dati sensoriali
Esperienza con protocolli di comunicazione industriale: PROFINET, PROFIBUS, KNX, BACnet, Modbus, Ethernet/IP, CANopen, EtherCAT
Esperienza con sensori e trasduttori per acquisizione dati (temperatura, umidit√†, pressione, accelerometri, giroscopi, vibrazionali, celle di carico, rogowski, sensori RFID/NFC)
Conoscenza di calibrazione, condizionamento segnali e interfacciamento con sistemi di acquisizione dati
Esperienza nello sviluppo di board IoT con Raspberry Pi, Arduino, STM32 per applicazioni industriali, monitoraggio remoto, automazione e integrazione sensori
Esperienza con i flussi di lavoro basati sui dati (importazione, pulizia, funzionalit√†)
Esperienza in process control, automazione, comunicazione machine-to-machine, machine-to-system e soluzioni Internet of Things (IOT)
Comprensione delle strutture dati, della modellazione dei dati e dell'architettura software
Conoscenza dei linguaggi di programmazione C, C++, VB.NET, SQL, Python
Laurea Magistrale in Ingegneria dell‚Äôautomazione, Ingegneria informatica, Ingegneria elettronica, Ingegneria elettrica.

Sar√† considerato titolo preferenziale l‚Äôaver partecipato ad un master/corso di formazione in AI, Machine Learning, con particolare focus sull'integrazione delle tecnologie IoT nei processi di automazione e nella gestione dei sistemi industriali intelligenti, inclusi i sistemi di monitoraggio e controllo avanzato.
La selezione √® rivolta ad entrambi i sessi nel rispetto del D.lgs. 198/2006.
Offerta di lavoro tutelata dalla L. 68/99 ‚Äì Categorie protette.

4188855191,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/software-engineer-front-end-p-iva-at-yuxme-4188855191?position=50&pageNum=0&refId=Vzryh%2BnA5vEHltalcx8O9A%3D%3D&trackingId=53%2B1YE19OY%2F%2F8MYVExaVUg%3D%3D,Software Engineer-Front End P.IVA,Yuxme,"Latium, Italy","Yuxme is looking for a Frontend Engineer who will play an important role of the front end team in the implementation and maintenance of a main product and the various microservices.

We aim to create a tool for the automation of the work processes of constantly evolving company documents and which has several actors who will have to interact with the platform. To this end, extreme care for usability and user experience will be a crucial aspect.
Tech stack used: React, .NET Core, Node.js, SQL Server, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, Git
Primary skills we consider: React, Redux, API Testing, Git
Secondary skills we consider: Unit Testing, CI/CD, Vue.js, Angular
React for frontend applications and miscroservices
Redis for caching, notifications and more
The platform hosting the services is Google Cloud Platform, through Kubernetes Cluster.
The Frontend Engineer will have the following responsibilities:
Implementation and documentation of the frontend infrastructure functionality, according to project specifications and user needs
Use of the REST API exposed by the backend services
Close collaboration with the technical team following the agile SCRUM mode and design choices to support the project requirements.
Ability to work in a team:
Proactivity and a sense of responsibility in carrying out the assigned tasks
Ability to communicate any critical issues and keep other team members updated on their developments
Knowledge and experience with frontend development technologies such as React and Redux / Saga or similar architectures
Experience in invoking REST API in Json format.
Experience using GIT as a code versioning tool
Knowledge and experience on writing Unit Test / End-To-End Test.
Experience in converting mock-ups into CSS using tools such as Figma, Zeplin or similar
Knowledge of CI / CD pipelines on Azure or similar
Knowledge of Vue.js or Angular as an alternative to React

Yuxme is looking for a Frontend Engineer who will play an important role of the front end team in the implementation and maintenance of a main product and the various microservices.


We aim to create a tool for the automation of the work processes of constantly evolving company documents and which has several actors who will have to interact with the platform. To this end, extreme care for usability and user experience will be a crucial aspect.


üìåRole Overview:

  • Experience level: Middle
  • Tech stack used: React, .NET Core, Node.js, SQL Server, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, Git
  • Primary skills we consider: React, Redux, API Testing, Git
  • Secondary skills we consider: Unit Testing, CI/CD, Vue.js, Angular


Our technology stack consists of:

  • React for frontend applications and miscroservices
  • Backend: .NetCore and NodeJs
  • Sql Server and DB Postgres
  • Redis for caching, notifications and more
  • Docker
  • Kubernetes
  • GIT on AzureDevops platform
  • Confluence

The platform hosting the services is Google Cloud Platform, through Kubernetes Cluster.


The Frontend Engineer will have the following responsibilities:

  • Implementation and documentation of the frontend infrastructure functionality, according to project specifications and user needs

Con pi√π di 140.000 professionisti in oltre 50 Paesi in tutto il mondo, siamo protagonisti e acceleratori della trasformazione digitale offrendo ai nostri clienti soluzioni tecnologiche e innovative progettate su misura. Il motore di NTTDATA sono le persone, ognuna con la propria unicit√†, talento ed attitudine. The ideal candidate as Senior Machine Learning Engineer in NTT DATA will have a solid Generative AI hands-on capability (preferably on Azure/GCP and on-premise GenAI architecture and MLops), mathematical background, experience working on a range of classification, informational retrieval, clustering, and optimization problems, establishing scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analysis, model development, model validation and model implementation.

The Senior Machine Learning Engineer will work alongside experienced Data Scientists, Data and ML Engineers to identify business opportunities, design and create new data pipelines from scratch, from experiments to deploying them in production.
He/She will be responsible for multiple projects, leading the ML Engineers and connecting with the stakeholders.
At least 5 years of production experience working in Data Science or Software Engineering
Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms
At least 6/12 months of experience in Generative AI deployment and underlying architecture handling
Vector Database knowledge is well appreciated
Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
Fluent in a at least two mainstream programming language (Python, Scala, Java, C++)
Experience in building an infrastructure for technical users, such as Data Scientist, ML practitioners or data consumers/producers
Strong knowledge of Spark, Databricks is a strong plus
Experience developing/deploying ML solutions in one of the public cloud platforms and on a Cross-cloud base, Snowflake knowledge is a plus
Deep knowledge with machine learning frameworks (such as Keras or PyTorch)
Ability to design and implement machine learning pipelines in a production environment
Experience with deployment including knowledge of CI/CD, containerization, and related concepts with a focus over MLops/Re-Training/Drift Management
Ability to train more junior team members in multiple Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts
Establish and maintain strong relationships with internal team members and external clients
Location: Milano, Bari, Bologna, Cosenza, Napoli, Pisa, Roma, Torino

Dal 1981 diamo alle imprese la possibilit√† di accelerare il proprio sviluppo con un pensiero strategico, un approccio pratico e un ampio portafoglio di soluzioni innovative, grazie alle competenze in ambito Data Consulting, Big Data, Data Streaming, Internet of Things, Industry 4.0, Artificial Intelligence e Blockchain.

Non importa a che punto ti trovi del tuo viaggio. Entrando in Sogetel sarai protagonista di questo cambiamento digitale.

4185412488,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/rookie-data-engineer-remote-at-agile-lab-4185412488?position=58&pageNum=0&refId=Vzryh%2BnA5vEHltalcx8O9A%3D%3D&trackingId=C9TP2yfOpRWc%2FS9TsbTJlQ%3D%3D,Rookie Data Engineer (Remote),Agile Lab,"Rome, Latium, Italy","Agile Lab is a company founded in 2014 with the mission to create value for its customers in data-intensive environments through customisable solutions that establish performance-driven processes, sustainable architectures and automated platforms based on data governance best practices.

Having delivered over 100 successful Elite Data Engineering initiatives, we have used this experience to create Witboost: a modular, technology-agnostic platform that enables modern organisations to discover, value and produce their data in both traditional environments and fully compliant Data Mesh architectures.
With a highly skilled team of over 160 data engineers based in Europe, Agile Lab helps organisations with their data-driven transformation.
Take a look at our handbook to discover our core values and processes.

We are looking to recruit a talented Rookie Data Engineer to join our team. In this role you will be required to implement data intensive applications. To be successful as an Engineer Rookie, you should have a good knowledge of computer science concepts. You should also have excellent problem solving skills.
Takes well-defined tasks and completing them with a growing autonomy
Understands and adopts our internal SDLC.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Engineering or Computer Science
No previous experience as a Data Engineer
Broad knowledge of computer science concepts
Understand what a development workflow is
Focus on growing as an engineer, learning existing tools, resource and processes
Ability to solve networking, data, and software issues
Full Remote or hybrid working in our offices: Milan, Turin, Padua, Bologna, Catania and Rende
A structured career path with clear expectations and salary for each level
Support of a buddy in the first week of work
A coach as a guide in choosing the most suitable experiences for your ambitions
Benefits and corporate welfare programs: company prizes and welcome pack with all the equipment you need to work
Agile Nomads Experience: opportunity to work for 2 weeks abroad
Referral bonus, if you bring people as talented as you
The opportunity to attend one conference per year
A company rated 4.8 out of 5 for employee satisfaction on Glassdoor and certified as a Great Place to Work
Inclusive environment where you can be who you really are
Stimulating environment oriented to growth, both professional and personal.
We don't like hierarchies: we work as a team
We don't like bureaucracies, we prefer sense of responsibility
We like data, certainly, so anything that is measurable
We want to make a positive change in our industry
Empathy, humility, collaboration, and willingness to challenge ourselves are the basis of our work.
Please note: only candidates based in European time zones (CEST or similar) will be considered for this position
ü§î Not sure which level to apply for? Check out our Career Ladder to learn more.

This position is open to all candidates, regardless of gender, and we strongly encourage applications from both male and female candidates pursuant to Art. 27 of Legislative Decree no. 198/2006, as well as those who identify themselves as non-binary or of any other kind. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace.

We are on a mission to transform cybersecurity challenges with a data driven approach. Our goal is to become a global vendor, with a disruptive platform to reshape the cybersecurity landscape. Traditional practices driven by risks hypothesis based on annual interviews and on-paper assessments are outdated. With our ESRA platform (Enhanced Security Risk Analytics), we provide near real-time visibility across the cyber realm and data-driven risk analysis, offering a revolutionary approach to objective cybersecurity risk management.

‚Ä¢ Startup Spirit: We value entrepreneurial drive, innovative thinking, and the grit to challenge the status quo.
‚Ä¢ Passion for Technology: If you are passionate about technology and improving society, this is the place for you.
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Benefits: Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, welfare incentives and stock options.

As a Graph Data Scientist, you will be crucial in developing, evolving and maintaining our innovative cybersecurity solution, ESRA. Your contribution will directly impact the safety and security of our digital world.
- Define algorithms to solve identified problems in the scope of the product, typically against large graph data structures representing complex cyber-physical environments

Join our Cybersecurity Team as a Graph Drawing Data Scientist!


Our mission: Revolutionizing Cybersecurity

We are on a mission to transform cybersecurity challenges with a data driven approach. Our goal is to become a global vendor, with a disruptive platform to reshape the cybersecurity landscape. Traditional practices driven by risks hypothesis based on annual interviews and on-paper assessments are outdated. With our ESRA platform (Enhanced Security Risk Analytics), we provide near real-time visibility across the cyber realm and data-driven risk analysis, offering a revolutionary approach to objective cybersecurity risk management.



Why Join Us?


‚Ä¢ Innovative Environment: Be part of a dynamic team of over 30 experts with deep and diverse expertise, pushing the boundaries of cybersecurity.

‚Ä¢ Startup Spirit: We value entrepreneurial drive, innovative thinking, and the grit to challenge the status quo.

‚Ä¢ Passion for Technology: If you are passionate about technology and improving society, this is the place for you.

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Benefits: Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, welfare incentives and stock options.


Your Role


As a Graph Data Scientist, you will be crucial in developing, evolving and maintaining our innovative cybersecurity solution, ESRA. Your contribution will directly impact the safety and security of our digital world.


You will be responsible for:


- Define algorithms to solve identified problems in the scope of the product, typically against large graph data structures representing complex cyber-physical environments
column2: evaluate and optimize complexity, prove relevance and correctness
column3:
follow up to production upon proposal acceptance.

- Implement proof of concepts to test and benchmark defined algorithms
column4:
collaboration with developers for production-grade implementations.

- Applied research activities to continuously improve the product capabilities in collaboration with domain knowledge experts


What We‚Äôre Looking For


Education: Master degree in a STEM discipline. Post-graduate education preferred, e.g., Ph.D. in computer science focusing on graph drawing or algorithms

Experience: At least 3 years in roles concerning definition and optimization of algorithms, graph drawing or big data analysis

Language Skills: Proficiency in the English language.


Technical Skills


  • Graph drawing: graphs theory and common algorithms, graph-based data structures design, definition of graph algorithms and analysis of computational complexity, algorithms optimization for selected use cases, graphs visualization techniques, large graphs handling techniques and common tools
  • Ability to devise algorithmic solutions to identified problems over large graph-based data structures controlling their complexity
  • Proficiency in at least one between Python and Java programming languages, to the extent necessary to implement proof of concepts, tests and benchmarks
  • Previous experience in a cyber security context will be considered a plus
  • Previous experience in creating large graphs visualizations will be considered a plus
  • Nice to have: Knowledge or experience with machine learning or other artificial intelligence fields or technologies


Apply Now!


Join us in revolutionizing the cybersecurity landscape. Send your application and become a part of our innovative journey.



The job search refers to candidates of both genders

4173089781,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/generative-ai-machine-learning-engineer-at-rina-4173089781?position=1&pageNum=2&refId=YEBS%2B4HxwpGLFYg4RG%2B%2FAw%3D%3D&trackingId=Tx1uiRFw2e90DkAawT0j6w%3D%3D,Generative AI & Machine Learning Engineer,RINA,"Rome, Latium, Italy","RINA is currently recruiting for a Generative AI & Machine Learning Engineer to join its office in Rome/Naples within the Digital Technology and Cybersecurity Division.

The mission of this role is to design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge generative AI solutions on the Azure platform. The successful candidate will leverage Azure's AI tools and services to create innovative applications that drive business growth and efficiency.
Solution Design & Development: Design and develop generative AI models and algorithms using Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, and Azure Machine Learning.
AI Model Training: Fine-tune and optimize pre-built generative models or develop custom solutions for NLP, image generation, and other AI applications.
Cloud Integration: Implement end-to-end AI solutions, integrating them with existing cloud infrastructures and leveraging Azure services such as Azure Data Lake, Azure Functions, and Azure DevOps.

Deployment & Monitoring: Deploy AI models in production environments, ensuring scalability, security, and high performance. Utilize Azure‚Äôs monitoring tools to track model performance and optimize for efficiency.
Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, cloud architects, and product teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Innovation: Stay updated with the latest trends in AI and cloud technology, continuously improving and adapting the AI solutions to enhance business capabilities.
Programming Languages: Advanced proficiency in Python, with experience in using AI/ML libraries (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow).
Azure AI Services: Strong knowledge of Azure OpenAI, Cognitive Services, and Azure Machine Learning.
Cloud Architecture: Solid understanding of cloud architecture, especially within the Azure ecosystem (Azure Functions, Azure DevOps, Azure Kubernetes Services).
DevOps Practices: Experience with DevOps practices for AI deployment (CI/CD pipelines, containerization).
Generative Models: In-depth experience with models like GPT-4, Llama, including fine-tuning and customization.
NLP Techniques: Experience in natural language processing and text generation patterns.
Advanced Python Development: Knowledge of best practices, frameworks, and code optimization.
Teamwork: Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Problem Solving: Analytical skills to tackle complex issues.
Certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate or similar certifications.
ADDRESS THE WAY - Have a big picture of different situations and reinterpret it in a perspective way
BUILD NETWORK - Forge trust relationships, across departments, and outside the organization
CLIENT INTIMACY - Embrace internal and external client needs, expectations, and requirements to ensure maximum satisfaction
EARN TRUST - Take everyone's opinion into account and remain open to diversity
MAKE EFFECTIVE DECISIONS - Structure activities according to priorities, actions, resources and constraint
MANAGE EMOTIONS - Recognise one's and other's emotions and express and regulate one's reactions
PIONEER CHANGE - Actively embrace change and benefit from the new circumstances
PROMOTE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT - Promote commitment by keeping promises as a Role Model
THINK FORWARD - Capitalise on experiences and translate them into action plans for the future

With over 5,800 employees and 200 offices in 70 countries worldwide, RINA is a multinational player which provides certification, marine classification, product testing, site supervision and vendor inspection, training and engineering consultancy services across a wide range of sectors. Our business model covers the full process of project development, from concept to completion. The aim is to guarantee a project‚Äôs technical, environmental and safety - and sometimes also economic and financial - sustainability.

At RINA, we endeavor to create a work environment where every single person is valued and encouraged to develop new ideas. We provide equal employment opportunities and are committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels respected and safe from discrimination or harassment of any kind. We are also compliant to the Italian Law n. 68/99.
RINA is currently recruiting for a <strong>Generative AI &amp
column2:

Mission

The mission of this role is to design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge generative AI solutions on the Azure platform. The successful candidate will leverage Azure's AI tools and services to create innovative applications that drive business growth and efficiency.

Key Accountabilities

  • Solution Design &
